title: Order Medical Records for Underwriting
description: An underwriter needs to order an Attending Physician's Statement (APS) to get more details on a condition disclosed in a life insurance application.

tasks.description: Identify the applicant and the disclosed medical condition requiring more information.
tasks.expected_outcome: The underwriter identifies the need for more details on the applicant's history of heart disease.

tasks.description: Verify that a signed medical authorization (HIPAA) form is on file.
tasks.expected_outcome: The underwriter confirms a valid HIPAA authorization is present.

tasks.description: Send a request to the applicant's physician for their medical records (APS).
tasks.expected_outcome: The underwriter successfully sends the APS request to the doctor's office.
